ayahs.text: Al^m^
>aHasiba {ln~aAsu >an yutorakuw^A@ >an yaquwluw^A@ 'aAman~aA wahumo laA yufotanuwna
walaqado fatan~aA {l~a*iyna min qabolihimo falayaEolaman~a {ll~ahu {l~a*iyna SadaquwA@ walayaEolaman~a {loka`*ibiyna
>amo Hasiba {l~a*iyna yaEomaluwna {ls~ay~i_#aAti >an yasobiquwnaA saA^'a maA yaHokumuwna
man kaAna yarojuwA@ liqaA^'a {ll~ahi fa<in~a >ajala {ll~ahi la'aAtK wahuwa {ls~amiyEu {loEaliymu
waman ja`hada fa<in~amaA yuja`hidu linafosihi.^ <in~a {ll~aha laganiY~N Eani {loEa`lamiyna
wa{l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ waEamiluwA@ {lS~a`liHa`ti lanukaf~iran~a Eanohumo say~i_#aAtihimo walanajoziyan~ahumo >aHosana {l~a*iY kaAnuwA@ yaEomaluwna
wawaS~ayonaA {lo<insa`na biwa`lidayohi HusonFA wa<in ja`hadaAka litu$orika biY maA layosa laka bihi. EilomN falaA tuTiEohumaA^ <ilaY~a marojiEukumo fa>unab~i}ukum bimaA kuntumo taEomaluwna
wa{l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ waEamiluwA@ {lS~a`liHa`ti lanudoxilan~ahumo fiY {lS~a`liHiyna

wamina {ln~aAsi man yaquwlu 'aAman~aA bi{ll~ahi fa<i*aA^ >uw*iYa fiY {ll~ahi jaEala fitonapa {ln~aAsi kaEa*aAbi {ll~ahi wala}in jaA^'a naSorN m~in r~ab~ika layaquwlun~a <in~aA kun~aA maEakumo >awalayosa {ll~ahu bi>aEolama bimaA fiY Suduwri {loEa`lamiyna
walayaEolaman~a {ll~ahu {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ walayaEolaman~a {lomuna`fiqiyna
waqaAla {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ lil~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ {t~abiEuwA@ sabiylanaA walonaHomilo xaTa`ya`kumo wamaA hum biHa`miliyna mino xaTa`ya`hum m~in $aYo'K <in~ahumo laka`*ibuwna
walayaHomilun~a >avoqaAlahumo wa>avoqaAlFA m~aEa >avoqaAlihimo walayuso_#alun~a yawoma {loqiya`mapi Eam~aA kaAnuwA@ yafotaruwna
walaqado >arosalonaA nuwHFA <ilaY` qawomihi. falabiva fiyhimo >alofa sanapK <il~aA xamosiyna EaAmFA fa>axa*ahumu {lT~uwfaAnu wahumo Za`limuwna
fa>anjayona`hu wa>aSoHa`ba {ls~afiynapi wajaEalona`haA^ 'aAyapF l~iloEa`lamiyna
wa<ibora`hiyma <i*o qaAla liqawomihi {EobuduwA@ {ll~aha wa{t~aquwhu *a`likumo xayorN l~akumo <in kuntumo taEolamuwna

<in~amaA taEobuduwna min duwni {ll~ahi >awova`nFA wataxoluquwna <ifokFA <in~a {l~a*iyna taEobuduwna min duwni {ll~ahi laA yamolikuwna lakumo rizoqFA fa{botaguwA@ Einda {ll~ahi {lr~izoqa wa{Eobuduwhu wa{$okuruwA@ lahu,^ <ilayohi turojaEuwna
wa<in tuka*~ibuwA@ faqado ka*~aba >umamN m~in qabolikumo wamaA EalaY {lr~asuwli <il~aA {lobala`gu {lomubiynu
>awalamo yarawoA@ kayofa yubodi}u {ll~ahu {loxaloqa vum~a yuEiyduhu,^ <in~a *a`lika EalaY {ll~ahi yasiyrN
qulo siyruwA@ fiY {lo>aroDi fa{nZuruwA@ kayofa bada>a {loxaloqa vum~a {ll~ahu yun$i}u {ln~a$o>apa {lo'aAxirapa <in~a {ll~aha EalaY` kul~i $aYo'K qadiyrN
yuEa*~ibu man ya$aA^'u wayaroHamu man ya$aA^'u wa<ilayohi tuqolabuwna
wamaA^ >antum bimuEojiziyna fiY {lo>aroDi walaA fiY {ls~amaA^'i wamaA lakum m~in duwni {ll~ahi min waliY~K walaA naSiyrK
wa{l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ bi_#aAya`ti {ll~ahi waliqaA^}ihi.^ >uw@la`^}ika ya}isuwA@ min r~aHomatiY wa>uw@la`^}ika lahumo Ea*aAbN >aliymN
famaA kaAna jawaAba qawomihi.^ <il~aA^ >an qaAluwA@ {qotuluwhu >awo Har~iquwhu fa>anjaY`hu {ll~ahu mina {ln~aAri <in~a fiY *a`lika la'aAya`tK l~iqawomK yu&ominuwna

waqaAla <in~amaA {t~axa*otum m~in duwni {ll~ahi >awova`nFA m~awad~apa bayonikumo fiY {loHayaw`pi {ld~unoyaA vum~a yawoma {loqiya`mapi yakofuru baEoDukum bibaEoDK wayaloEanu baEoDukum baEoDFA wama>owaY`kumu {ln~aAru wamaA lakum m~in n~a`Siriyna
fa_#aAmana lahu, luwTN waqaAla <in~iY muhaAjirN <ilaY` rab~iY^ <in~ahu, huwa {loEaziyzu {loHakiymu
wawahabonaA lahu,^ <isoHa`qa wayaEoquwba wajaEalonaA fiY *ur~iy~atihi {ln~ubuw~apa wa{lokita`ba wa'aAtayona`hu >ajorahu, fiY {ld~unoyaA wa<in~ahu, fiY {lo'aAxirapi lamina {lS~a`liHiyna
waluwTFA <i*o qaAla liqawomihi.^ <in~akumo lata>otuwna {lofa`Hi$apa maA sabaqakum bihaA mino >aHadK m~ina {loEa`lamiyna

>a}in~akumo lata>otuwna {lr~ijaAla wataqoTaEuwna {ls~abiyla wata>otuwna fiY naAdiykumu {lomunkara famaA kaAna jawaAba qawomihi.^ <il~aA^ >an qaAluwA@ {}otinaA biEa*aAbi {ll~ahi <in kunta mina {lS~a`diqiyna
qaAla rab~i {nSuroniY EalaY {loqawomi {lomufosidiyna
walam~aA jaA^'ato rusulunaA^ <ibora`hiyma bi{lobu$oraY` qaAluw^A@ <in~aA muholikuw^A@ >aholi ha`*ihi {loqaroyapi <in~a >aholahaA kaAnuwA@ Za`limiyna
qaAla <in~a fiyhaA luwTFA qaAluwA@ naHonu >aEolamu biman fiyhaA lanunaj~iyan~ahu, wa>aholahu,^ <il~aA {mora>atahu, kaAnato mina {loga`biriyna
walam~aA^ >an jaA^'ato rusulunaA luwTFA siY^'a bihimo waDaAqa bihimo *aroEFA waqaAluwA@ laA taxafo walaA taHozano <in~aA munaj~uwka wa>aholaka <il~aA {mora>ataka kaAnato mina {loga`biriyna
<in~aA munziluwna EalaY`^ >aholi ha`*ihi {loqaroyapi rijozFA m~ina {ls~amaA^'i bimaA kaAnuwA@ yafosuquwna
walaqad t~arakonaA minohaA^ 'aAyapF[ bay~inapF l~iqawomK yaEoqiluwna
wa<ilaY` madoyana >axaAhumo $uEayobFA faqaAla ya`qawomi {EobuduwA@ {ll~aha wa{rojuwA@ {loyawoma {lo'aAxira walaA taEovawoA@ fiY {lo>aroDi mufosidiyna
faka*~abuwhu fa>axa*atohumu {lr~ajofapu fa>aSobaHuwA@ fiY daArihimo ja`vimiyna
waEaAdFA wavamuwdaA@ waqad t~abay~ana lakum m~in m~asa`kinihimo wazay~ana lahumu {l$~ayoTa`nu >aEoma`lahumo faSad~ahumo Eani {ls~abiyli wakaAnuwA@ musotaboSiriyna
waqa`ruwna wafiroEawona waha`ma`na walaqado jaA^'ahum m~uwsaY` bi{lobay~ina`ti fa{sotakobaruwA@ fiY {lo>aroDi wamaA kaAnuwA@ sa`biqiyna

fakul~FA >axa*onaA bi*an[bihi. faminohum m~ano >arosalonaA Ealayohi HaASibFA waminohum m~ano >axa*atohu {lS~ayoHapu waminohum m~ano xasafonaA bihi {lo>aroDa waminohum m~ano >agoraqonaA wamaA kaAna {ll~ahu liyaZolimahumo wala`kin kaAnuw^A@ >anfusahumo yaZolimuwna
mavalu {l~a*iyna {t~axa*uwA@ min duwni {ll~ahi >awoliyaA^'a kamavali {loEankabuwti {t~axa*ato bayotFA wa<in~a >awohana {lobuyuwti labayotu {loEankabuwti lawo kaAnuwA@ yaEolamuwna
<in~a {ll~aha yaEolamu maA yadoEuwna min duwnihi. min $aYo'K wahuwa {loEaziyzu {loHakiymu
watiloka {lo>amova`lu naDoribuhaA liln~aAsi wamaA yaEoqiluhaA^ <il~aA {loEa`limuwna
xalaqa {ll~ahu {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDa bi{loHaq~i <in~a fiY *a`lika la'aAyapF l~ilomu&ominiyna
{tolu maA^ >uwHiYa <ilayoka mina {lokita`bi wa>aqimi {lS~alaw`pa <in~a {lS~alaw`pa tanohaY` Eani {lofaHo$aA^'i wa{lomunkari wala*ikoru {ll~ahi >akobaru wa{ll~ahu yaEolamu maA taSonaEuwna

walaA tuja`diluw^A@ >ahola {lokita`bi <il~aA bi{l~atiY hiYa >aHosanu <il~aA {l~a*iyna ZalamuwA@ minohumo waquwluw^A@ 'aAman~aA bi{l~a*iY^ >unzila <ilayonaA wa>unzila <ilayokumo wa<ila`hunaA wa<ila`hukumo wa`HidN wanaHonu lahu, musolimuwna
waka*a`lika >anzalonaA^ <ilayoka {lokita`ba fa{l~a*iyna 'aAtayona`humu {lokita`ba yu&ominuwna bihi. wamino ha`^&ulaA^'i man yu&ominu bihi. wamaA yajoHadu bi_#aAya`tinaA^ <il~aA {loka`firuwna
wamaA kunta tatoluwA@ min qabolihi. min kita`bK walaA taxuT~uhu, biyamiynika <i*FA l~a{rotaAba {lomuboTiluwna
balo huwa 'aAya`tN[ bay~ina`tN fiY Suduwri {l~a*iyna >uwtuwA@ {loEiloma wamaA yajoHadu bi_#aAya`tinaA^ <il~aA {lZ~a`limuwna
waqaAluwA@ lawolaA^ >unzila Ealayohi 'aAya`tN m~in r~ab~ihi. qulo <in~amaA {lo'aAya`tu Einda {ll~ahi wa<in~amaA^ >anaA" na*iyrN m~ubiynN
>awalamo yakofihimo >an~aA^ >anzalonaA Ealayoka {lokita`ba yutolaY` Ealayohimo <in~a fiY *a`lika laraHomapF wa*ikoraY` liqawomK yu&ominuwna
qulo kafaY` bi{ll~ahi bayoniY wabayonakumo $ahiydFA yaEolamu maA fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi wa{l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ bi{loba`Tili wakafaruwA@ bi{ll~ahi >uw@la`^}ika humu {loxa`siruwna
wayasotaEojiluwnaka bi{loEa*aAbi walawolaA^ >ajalN m~usam~FY l~ajaA^'ahumu {loEa*aAbu walaya>otiyan~ahum bagotapF wahumo laA ya$oEuruwna
yasotaEojiluwnaka bi{loEa*aAbi wa<in~a jahan~ama lamuHiyTapN[ bi{loka`firiyna
yawoma yago$aY`humu {loEa*aAbu min fawoqihimo wamin taHoti >arojulihimo wayaquwlu *uwquwA@ maA kuntumo taEomaluwna
ya`EibaAdiYa {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuw^A@ <in~a >aroDiY wa`siEapN fa<iy~a`Ya fa{Eobuduwni
kul~u nafosK *aA^}iqapu {lomawoti vum~a <ilayonaA turojaEuwna
wa{l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ waEamiluwA@ {lS~a`liHa`ti lanubaw~i}an~ahum m~ina {lojan~api gurafFA tajoriY min taHotihaA {lo>anoha`ru xa`lidiyna fiyhaA niEoma >ajoru {loEa`miliyna
{l~a*iyna SabaruwA@ waEalaY` rab~ihimo yatawak~aluwna
waka>ay~in m~in daA^b~apK l~aA taHomilu rizoqahaA {ll~ahu yarozuquhaA wa<iy~aAkumo wahuwa {ls~amiyEu {loEaliymu
wala}in sa>alotahum m~ano xalaqa {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDa wasax~ara {l$~amosa wa{loqamara layaquwlun~a {ll~ahu fa>an~aY` yu&ofakuwna
{ll~ahu yabosuTu {lr~izoqa liman ya$aA^'u mino EibaAdihi. wayaqodiru lahu,^ <in~a {ll~aha bikul~i $aYo'K EaliymN
wala}in sa>alotahum m~an n~az~ala mina {ls~amaA^'i maA^'F fa>aHoyaA bihi {lo>aroDa min[ baEodi mawotihaA layaquwlun~a {ll~ahu quli {loHamodu lil~ahi balo >akovaruhumo laA yaEoqiluwna
wamaA ha`*ihi {loHayaw`pu {ld~unoyaA^ <il~aA lahowN walaEibN wa<in~a {ld~aAra {lo'aAxirapa lahiYa {loHayawaAnu lawo kaAnuwA@ yaEolamuwna
fa<i*aA rakibuwA@ fiY {lofuloki daEawuA@ {ll~aha muxoliSiyna lahu {ld~iyna falam~aA naj~aY`humo <ilaY {lobar~i <i*aA humo yu$orikuwna
liyakofuruwA@ bimaA^ 'aAtayona`humo waliyatamat~aEuwA@ fasawofa yaEolamuwna
>awalamo yarawoA@ >an~aA jaEalonaA HaramFA 'aAminFA wayutaxaT~afu {ln~aAsu mino Hawolihimo >afabi{loba`Tili yu&ominuwna wabiniEomapi {ll~ahi yakofuruwna
wamano >aZolamu mim~ani {fotaraY` EalaY {ll~ahi ka*ibFA >awo ka*~aba bi{loHaq~i lam~aA jaA^'ahu,^ >alayosa fiY jahan~ama mavowFY l~iloka`firiyna
wa{l~a*iyna ja`haduwA@ fiynaA lanahodiyan~ahumo subulanaA wa<in~a {ll~aha lamaEa {lomuHosiniyna
